Description of incident: An assistant allegedly recorded two sets of patient data on to a personal laptop  for research purposes. One set included three years' worth of patient data and  another held 18 years of medical information. The physician assistant's laptop  was never connected to the VA network and any data she recorded on her laptop  was hand entered. The department has not disclosed the number of patients  involved in the incident, what kind of personal data was copied, or whether it  plans to notify the veterans whose records were downloaded.
